title: Coronavirus: PM urges people to live responsibly with Covid as England's lockdown eases
content:
1. Coronavirus: PM urges people to live responsibly with Covid as England's lockdown eases  BBC News
  2. Brits could soon hug again with Boris Johnson set to ease lockdown  CNBC
  3. U.K. PM Boris Johnson Says Indoor Mixing Allowed in England Starting May 17  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  4. Lockdown: Boris Johnson to announce 17 May changes for England  BBC News
  5. Hug with 'care and common sense,' Boris Johnson says as lockdown rules for England ease  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
